title: Modern, fully renovated 2 bedroom 1 bath available at Caliber Place Ap
posting_body: Modern, fully renovated 2 bedroom 1 bath available at Caliber Place Apartments in Napa, CA
Enjoy this modern, fully renovated sparkling clean 2 bedroom 1 bath apartment at Caliber Place!
This is an inviting 16-unit gated community with an Onsite Manager.
Caliber Place Apartments is offering a 2 bedroom apartment with a full size luxurious bathroom updated inside and out.
All units have Luxury Vinyl Plank flooring throughout, quartz counter tops with well-lit kitchen breakfast bar.
Indoor washer and dryer are included.
All new stainless steel appliances including; refrigerator, microwave hood, electric stove, dishwasher, wall AC and wall furnace.
Caliber Place Apartments is located near Napa Premium Outlets with easy access to Highway 29.
Utilities: Water And Garbage Service Included.
Landscaping Service: Included In Community Space.
Due to the social distancing requirements in place we are performing initial showings of our units via video.
Please see the video recording for each unit on our website.
If you have any questions, click “Contact us” or give us a call at
Online applications must be submitted for consideration after videos have been viewed.
If your application is approved, you will be able to schedule a personal viewing of the property prior to committing to renting.
Application fees will not be refunded.
The video and photos in this listing depict a similar unit with generally the same features and amenities as the unit being offered.
Xfinity Basic Internet Service Included at Extra Fee
